```{r T0_Species}
T0 <- Brondata[,c("X","gbifapi_acceptedScientificName")]
T0$X <- NULL

T0$SPEC <- gsub(" ", "_", T0_Species$gbifapi_acceptedScientificName, fixed = T )
T0$SPEC <- gsub(".", "_", T0_Species$SPEC, fixed = T )
T0$SPEC <- gsub(",", "_", T0_Species$SPEC, fixed = T )
T0$SPEC <- gsub("&", "_", T0_Species$SPEC, fixed = T )
T0$SPEC <- gsub("(", "_", T0_Species$SPEC, fixed = T ) 
T0$SPEC <- gsub(")", "_", T0_Species$SPEC, fixed = T )

table(T0$SPEC)


```
